title: Google Pixel 6a and ‘Pixel Watch’ tipped to come in three colors each, 32GB storage for watch
content:
It’s pretty clear at this point that the long-overdue “Pixel Watch” is finally coming this year, and according to a new report, the Wear OS smartwatch will come in three colors and deliver a huge amount of storage.

more…

The post Google Pixel 6a and ‘Pixel Watch’ tipped to come in three colors each, 32GB storage for watch appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: According to a new report, the upcoming "Pixel Watch" will come in three colors and will feature an unprecedented amount of storage.
